title: Amazon sourcing
job_overview:
Job Title: Amazon Wholesale Product Researcher & Supplier Coordinator
Job Type: Full-Time

Really looking for people who have experience doing wholesale, which means talking to distributors and getting wholesale deals. I'm not looking for coupons. I'm looking for lower prices.

Job Overview:
We’re looking for reliable, detail-oriented individuals to help us grow our Amazon wholesale business. Your main responsibilities will be finding profitable branded products to resell on Amazon and reaching out to authorized distributors or wholesalers to open accounts and place orders.

On the top line of your application, please put the word summer or I will not read your application.
Key Responsibilities:

Perform product research using tools like Keepa, SellerAmp, etc. to identify profitable, low-competition products.

Analyze sales rank, profit margins, fees, and competition.

Contact brand owners, wholesalers, and distributors via email and phone.

Set up new wholesale accounts and request product catalogs.

Compare wholesale prices to Amazon listings to determine profitability.

Track leads, accounts, and product opportunities in spreadsheets or CRM tools.

Work closely with the purchasing team to restock fast-moving items.

Stay updated on Amazon policies and listing best practices.

Requirements:

Strong attention to detail and analytical skills.

Basic understanding of Amazon FBA and wholesale business model (training can be provided).

Familiar with Keepa, SellerAmp, or similar tools (preferred).

Good communication skills (written and verbal).

Comfortable working with spreadsheets (Google Sheets / Excel).

Self-motivated and able to hit deadlines consistently.

Preferred (but not required):

Experience in Amazon wholesale or e-commerce

Familiarity with contacting suppliers or B2B communication

Sales or customer service background
